column1: The Pit Room////The bbq sauce is on the tangy side
column2: and although I tend to go for the sweeter barbecue sauces
column3: this one was really good. Â The mac and cheese wasn't really my thing
column4: because I'm not a fan of queso cheese. I'm a cheddar cheese gal. I originally sat outside
column5: but had an issue with flies wanting to get a piece
column6: so I recommend sitting inside. It still doesn't steer me away from how great and how special this place was.
